column5: The pressures on the oceans and seas and public awareness of the damage being done to marine environments have never been greater than they are now. If you wish to make an effective contribution to the future of marine conservation, the Marine Conservation programme at Aberdeen will equip you with the essential knowledge and skills to work in a range of organisations, such as statutory nature conservation bodies, government regulators, environmental consultancies, non-governmental organisations and research institutes.
